verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַגִּתִּ֑ית <S%H1665><s%> upon Gittith לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֥רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יְּדִיד֥וֹת <S%H3039><s%> How amiable מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H4908><s%> [are] thy tabernacles יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

נִכְסְפָ֬ה <S%H3700><s%> longeth וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and even כָּלְתָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3615><s%> yea even fainteth נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> My soul לְחַצְר֪וֹת <S%H2691><s%> for the courts יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִבִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> my heart וּבְשָׂרִ֑י <S%H1320><s%> and my flesh יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> crieth out אֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> about אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> God חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> for the living

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also צִפּ֨וֹר ׀ <S%H6833><s%> Yea the sparrow מָ֪צְאָה <S%H4672><s%> hath found בַ֡יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house וּדְר֤וֹר ׀ <S%H1866><s%> and the swallow קֵ֥ן <S%H7064><s%> a nest לָהּ֮ אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where שָׁ֪תָה <S%H7896><s%> for herself where she may lay אֶפְרֹ֫חֶ֥יהָ <S%H667><s%> her young אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֭זְבְּחוֹתֶיךָ <S%H4196><s%> [even] thine altars יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts מַ֝לְכִּ֗י <S%H4428><s%> my King וֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> and my God

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> [are] they that dwell בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> in thy house ע֝֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> are ever יְֽהַלְל֥וּךָ <S%H1984><s%> they will be still praising סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> thee Selah

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Blessed אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> [is] the man עֽוֹז־ <S%H5797><s%> whose strength ל֥וֹ בָ֑ךְ מְ֝סִלּ֗וֹת <S%H4546><s%> [are] the ways בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> [is] in thee in whose heart

עֹבְרֵ֤י ׀ <S%H5674><s%> [Who] passing בְּעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> through the valley הַ֭בָּכָא <S%H1056><s%> of Baca מַעְיָ֣ן <S%H4599><s%> it a well יְשִׁית֑וּהוּ <S%H7896><s%> make גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בְּ֝רָכ֗וֹת <S%H1293><s%> the pools יַעְטֶ֥ה <S%H5844><s%> also filleth מוֹרֶֽה׃ <S%H4175><s%> the rain

יֵ֭לְכוּ <S%H1980><s%> go מֵחַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> from strength אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> to strength יֵרָאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> appeareth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> before God בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> [every one of them] in Zion

יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God צְ֭בָאוֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שִׁמְעָ֣ה <S%H8085><s%> hear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> my prayer הַאֲזִ֨ינָה <S%H238><s%> give ear אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> O God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

מָ֭גִנֵּנוּ <S%H4043><s%> our shield רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> Behold אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God וְ֝הַבֵּ֗ט <S%H5027><s%> and look פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4899><s%> of thine anointed

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> [is] better י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For a day בַּחֲצֵרֶ֗יךָ <S%H2691><s%> in thy courts מֵ֫אָ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> than a thousand בָּחַ֗רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> I had rather הִ֭סְתּוֹפֵף <S%H5605><s%> be a doorkeeper בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֱלֹהַ֑י <S%H430><s%> of my God מִ֝דּ֗וּר <S%H1752><s%> than to dwell בְּאָהֳלֵי־ <S%H168><s%> in the tents רֶֽשַׁע׃ <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> is a שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ ׀ <S%H8121><s%> [is] a sun וּמָגֵן֮ <S%H4043><s%> and shield יְהוָ֪ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> grace וְ֭כָבוֹד <S%H3519><s%> and glory יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> will give יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No יִמְנַע־ <S%H4513><s%> [thing] will he withhold ט֝֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> no good לַֽהֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> from them that walk בְּתָמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> uprightly
יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> blessed אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> [is] the man בֹּטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> that trusteth בָּֽךְ׃
